## sequence variable

Given a collection of nodes, sequence them in an array and return the result along with the updated tags.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sequence: (...content: TaggedContentItem[]) => {
    nodes: TaggedProsemirrorNode[];
    tags: Tags;
}
```
